name: ReConnect (Portaldominates)
description:
In the year 2238, the world was dying. Pollution had caused the sky to turn brown and acid rain fell nonstop. Humanity created their final hope: AI. For 5 years, scientists and engineers slaved away to design something, anything that could save us.  Their plan backfired.

The year is now 2244, one year after the incident that destroyed 90% of all human life. The AI designed by humanity turned against them, creating armies of robot minions to carry out its deeds. You are the survivors' only remaining hope. You must find a way to reconnect cities so that people can reunite and fight back against their robot overlords.

This is a platforming game made using GameMaker Studio 2 for the 4th ExtraCredits GameJam.
